word_mean: 动物区系：存在于特定区域或地方内或有特定区域或地方特性的动物，可以肉眼辨认(宏观动物区系)或只能借助显微镜才能辨认(微观动物区系)
生活在某一地区的全部动物种类。

sentence.Network_en: A vacant lot or a bombsite can, to the amateur naturalist, produce an extraordinary variety of flora and fauna.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于业余博物学者来说，在一片空地上或被炸后的废墟里可能发现种类繁多的植物群和动物群。

sentence.Network_en: Litter breakdown or fragmentation is due to the litter fauna.
sentence.Network_cn: 落叶层粉碎的原因在于落叶层的动物相.

sentence.Network_en: The fauna in the Joli Fou consists of bivalves and arenaceous forams.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔里富组内的化石主要是双壳类和砂壳有孔虫.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: modern Latin application of Fauna, the name of a rural goddess, sister of Faunus

entry.def: Animals, especially the animals in a particular area, can be referred to as fauna .

example.ex: ...the flora and fauna of the African jungle...
Brackish waters generally support only a small range of faunas.
example.tran: 咸水水域通常只能存活为数不多的几种动物。

means.word_mean: 1. all the animal life in a particular region
2. a living organism characterized by voluntary movement
